content.raw:
I just crashed a PR2 against the wall and I destroyed part of it. That's pretty cool!

I just noticed that the wall behaves like a spring. A chunk of the wall was ejected towards the sky and it got stuck up in the air. Attached a picture in which I've highlighted the piece of wall.

![Floating piece of wall](http://gsyc.es/~caguero/pieceOfWall.png)
content.html:
I just crashed a PR2 against the wall and I destroyed part of it. That's pretty cool!

I just noticed that the wall behaves like a spring. A chunk of the wall was ejected towards the sky and it got stuck up in the air. Attached a picture in which I've highlighted the piece of wall.
